description: Build script for copying and preparing web component project files, including copying directories, renaming imports, and updating HTML references.

methods.name: copy
methods.description: Asynchronously copies a file from source to destination, creating necessary directories.

methods.name: copyFilesToMove
methods.description: Copies multiple files specified in an array to the target directory.

methods.name: updateImports
methods.description: Reads a file, replaces import path strings, and writes back the updated content.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Main async function that orchestrates cleaning, copying files/directories, updating HTML, and renaming imports.
